headline: Ecolab Delivers on Commitments to Save Water in Historic AI Era
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., March 21, 2025--Water is the world’s most essential resource, and it’s only grown more critical in the age of AI. During this transformative digital revolution, Ecolab, a global sustainability leader that maximizes growth and performance through water solutions and infection prevention services, has continued to meet its goals and work with customers to deliver profitability while advancing optimized water use.
